products.description: The imop 36 is an effective yet budget-friendly cleaning solution. A built-in self-diagnosing feature provides immediate alerts and guidance in case of any issues, helping to minimize downtime.

products.name: i-mop XL Pro
products.description: With i-link cloud data tracking, i-dose for precise liquid dosing, and dual speed settings for quieter day cleaning, the i-mop XL Pro adapts to any environment. Its brushless motor extends runtime and reduces noise, while i-balance technology improves ergonomics, making it easier to handle. A coated deck allows safe use in wet areas like pools and saunas, and the antimicrobial tanks keep the machine fresher between uses. For high-performance cleaning on all hard floors, the XL Pro's 350 RPM brushes provide powerful, professional results.
